metadata.title: CVE-2022-3313 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in full screen in Google Chrome prior to106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to spoof security UI via a craftedHTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
